Beth Eden

Graceville

Lush, leafy riverside location

Be part of a large, warm family at Beth Eden in the south-western suburb of Graceville.

Beth Eden's elegant centrepiece is the heritage-listed Verney House, built in 1888. The village's leafy surrounds and stunning river frontage give Beth Eden a wonderfully boutique feel.

Close by to everything you need

Beth Eden is five minutes from Indooroopilly shopping centre, 600 metres from shops and public transport, and just nine kilometres from the city.

  • Community hall
  • Hairdressing salon
  • Verney House
  • Small library
  • Elegant residents lounge
Independent living Residential aged care

Residential aged care

Our aged care facility at Beth Eden is well-established in the bayside area for providing exceptional, loving care for residents.

Being a smaller village, aged care at Janoah Gardens has a distinct home-like feel and a close-knit family of fellow residents and dedicated staff.

Find out more about aged care at Bethany Christian Care.

Extra features for your peace of mind

  • Digital care and medication management system (iCare)
  • Wireless intra-facility communication
  • VoIP telephone and internet
  • Aged Care Quality and Safety Commission accredited

Secure dementia care

At Beth Eden we have a secure wing for people living with dementia.
